accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on Maroon background is White. Text on Gold background must be Dark Brown/Black.
accessibility.focus_states: Focus rings must be Maroon (#800000) with 2px offset.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific Maroon (#800000) and Gold (#FFD700) colors under 'extend.colors'.
3. AUTH LAYOUT: Use the 'Split Screen' layout for all login/register pages. Left side is the School Building image with a Maroon overlay. Right side is the form.
4. STUDENT DASHBOARD: Do not use a sidebar. Use a top navigation bar with a 'Mega Menu' feel. The main content should be a centered timeline of their transcript request.
5. ADMIN DASHBOARD: Use a Sidebar layout. The dashboard must be dense. Use 'Table' components heavily.
6. STATUS BADGES: Use the specific color mappings defined in 'components.badges'.
7. LOGO: Since we don't have the official SVG, render a text-based logo using 'Playfair Display' font: 'Wolmer's Boys' School' in Maroon.
8. FORMS: Use Shadcn Form components but style the inputs with 'focus:ring-[#800000]'.
10. CHARTS: Use Recharts with the Maroon/Gold palette for the Admin Dashboard.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
